source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: SolidWorks 2020 Learning by Doing 1. Car Canopy Design
items.headline: SolidWorks 2020
objectives_summary: Solid modeling. Some FEM analysis. Detailed drawings. Concept design. File exporting

items.title: Procedural House in Houdini
items.headline: Learn to model procedural house in Houdini
objectives_summary: You will learn how to work proceduraly in Houdini.
You will learn to use VEX code in practise.
And how to use expressions.

items.title: Houdini FX - How to add Visual Effects in Real Videos
items.headline: Learn how to add and compositing special effects and simulations with live footage
objectives_summary: How to add simulations and visual effects in real videos
Camera tracking
Simulations in Houdini: fire, smoke and water

items.title: Ten 2D Drawings to Master 2D Sketching in Solidworks
items.headline: Master 2D sketching & sketch relations in Solidworks now!
objectives_summary: In this course students will gain understanding of 2d sketching  and mastery of various sketch relations in Solidworks.

items.title: Intro to Maya 3D Animation for Beginners
items.headline: Introduction to Autodesk Maya! Learn modeling, animation, rigging, texturing, materials, rendering, lighting & dynamics
objectives_summary: Modeling
Texturing
UV Mapping

items.title: Master Adobe Edge Animate CC - Edge Animate Made Easy
items.headline: Want to learn how to unleash the power of Adobe Edge Animate and create amazing moving graphics?
objectives_summary: Learn how to create amazing moving graphics using Edge Animate

items.title: A Complete Guide to Creating Animated Information Graphics

visible_instructors.job_title: Senior Graphics Editor at The New York Times
visible_instructors.name: Graham
visible_instructors.title: Graham Roberts

items.headline: From conception, to storyboard, to animating with Maya 3D. Learn to make effective 3D animated information graphics.
objectives_summary: plan and design an animated information graphic project
model, animate, and render in 3D
explore data in 3D

items.title: Learning Substance Painter 2021: From Beginner to Advance
items.headline: Learn to Texture in 3D with Supplied Practice Models
objectives_summary: - Learn to navigate the user interface of Substance Painter 2021 with ease
- Importing 3D Models
- Walkthrough in how to bake maps with provided high rez meshes onto low rez models, for procedural texturing processes

items.title: Blender Modeling and Animation (Full Version)
items.headline: Modeling and animation techniques, including lip-syncing cartoon characters, lighting and creating materials.
objectives_summary: Create and animate realistic human characters
Model, rig, and animate cartoon characters
Make photorealistic rendered images

items.title: Become Character Animation Expert in Adobe Flash
items.headline: This module will teach you how we can use flash tools and techniques for Conventional Character Animation.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to do your onw 2d character animated story, Animated Greeting Cards and much more...!
In this course, you will learn how to give life to character.

items.title: Model a Stylized Aircraft in Maya 2018
items.headline: Hard Surface Modeling
objectives_summary: After taking this course students will have the skills to build and design a custom stylized vehicle of thier choice
Student will learn how to create, name and add tools to a custom shelf in Maya
Student will learn how to  extract a curve from the edge of objects

items.title: Visual Effects Producing 101

visible_instructors.job_title: Filmmaker with a Visual effects production background
visible_instructors.name: Hasraf
visible_instructors.title: Hasraf Dulull

items.headline: How to become a Visual Effects Producer in Film and Television.
objectives_summary: Visual Effects
CGI
Film / TV Production

items.title: Realistic Female Character Sculpting for Artists
items.headline: Improve your character sculpting with good anatomy, Weapon modeling in Zbrush and make better Hair using Maya Xgen.
objectives_summary: Female Anatomy
Hard Surface Weapons Modeling in Zbrush
Creating Hair with Maya Xgen

items.title: Blender 2.8 and Substance painter - 3D modeling game assets
items.headline: Model , sculpt and optimize a fantasy bow so it's ready to use in your game and make beautiful render for your portfolio
objectives_summary: 3d modeling
sculpting details
optimising mesh for video games

items.title: Tips For Creating A Cute & Simple Character & Animating it!
items.headline: A brief lesson on creating a cute character, and animating it with a simple wave!
objectives_summary: Students will learn some brief tips on creating an appealing character, and to bring them to life.

items.title: Learn to Render with SolidWorks Visualize
items.headline: Render photo-realistic images of products or other 3d models quickly and easily with Visualize.
objectives_summary: Use Visualize to create incredible photo-realistic images of multiple types of 3D models.
Improve the quality and realism of your renderings.
Best practices and tips for using Visualize quickly and effectively.
